definition: devouring or craving food in great quantities
details:
adjective
- devouring or craving food in great quantities
= example: devouring or craving food in great quantities
= synonyms: edacious
- excessively greedy and grasping
= example: excessively greedy and grasping
= synonyms: ravening, voracious
- living by preying on other animals, especially by catching living prey
= example: living by preying on other animals, especially by catching living prey
= synonyms: ravening, predatory, raptorial, vulturous
